title: Bloomtastic
name: bloomtastic
description: Certificate Revocation checking using bloom filters
author: James Larisch, Aditya Rao

preferences.name: hardFail
preferences.title: Fail type
preferences.description: Choose what the app must do when revocation check fails

preferences.name: filterType
preferences.title: Security Strength for the CRLFilter
preferences.description: Indicator of the level of security required that determines the type of the CRLFilter used

options.label: Includes revoked CA and EV certs
Includes above and certificates revoked due to key compromise
Includes above and revoked certificates from top 10000 alexa ranked sites
Includes above and revoked certificates from top 100000 alexa ranked sites

preferences.name: updateInterval
preferences.title: Frequency of filter updates
preferences.description: Update frequency for filter sync (number of days)

preferences.name: lastUpdate
preferences.title: Last update of filter
preferences.description: Last update time of the filter on the server, read-only

preferences.name: extraSerial
preferences.title: Add serial numbers to filter
preferences.description: For self-test, add serial numbers to filters. Multiple serial numbers must be separated by commas.

preferences.name: enabled
preferences.title: Enabled
preferences.label: Enable blocking websites based on filter revocation.
